title: Find the Missing Letters
content:
ou'll have the following dialogue choices:

I'm sorry to tell you - I found the body of one of your couriers. He carried this letter. Wait - delivery not guaranteed? I'm not sending anything. You can drop the sales routine. It's rare to meet someone so cheerful these days. Why the good mood. Leave.

If you pick the first option, you'll give him the Personal Note and let him know about Gomwick. He'll then explain that with Gomwick gone, he's been attempting to send letters by pigeons, but these p
